verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
SAVIOR OF MY SOUL
LOVER OF MY LIFE
I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
PASSION OF MY HEART
EVERYTHING YOU ARE
I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
YOU LOVED ME BEFORE I KNEW OF YOU
YOU LOVED ME NOW I GIVE IT BACK TO OU

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
WITH YOUR MAJESTY HERE
I FALL TO MY KNEES
I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
WITH THE BEAUTY OF YOUR SON
I FIND MYSELF UNDONE
I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY
